Episodes.Title: Nicki's POV
Episodes.Plot: Nicki meets a handsome musical producer named Riggs and is pretty soon all over him at a party. He invites her and Sasha to a private party the next night, but Sasha has second thoughts about going when Nicki says Rob can't go. At the party, Nicki's puts her moves on Riggs, but he's more interested in Sasha. Jealous, Nicki isn't willing to go down without a fight and confronts Sasha, who says she only sent Riggs a tape because he's a big musical producer and that might be her break. Sasha assure

Episodes.Title: Jamie's POV
Episodes.Plot: Jamie is a bit freaked out after a dream about him and Sooz as a loving parent-couple in the future. Their affair is still a secret to all of their friends, in which bothers Sooz, and they have a vague fight where she says he's not her boyfriend. Later, Jamie and Rob goes to the Root Bar, where Anna hits on him. Then Sooz comes. She says she's sorry about earlier, but they fight again, and Jamie goes with Anna. Meanwhile Nicki is still mad at Sasha, and when Riggs calls Sasha while she, Rob, Ale

Episodes.Title: Sasha's POV
Episodes.Plot:
Riggs won't stop hitting on Sasha, and she's finding it harder and harder to avoid giving intp temptation. 
She gets mad at every move he makes, but at the same time is confused about her relationship with Rob. 

Meanwhile, she's trying to make things up with Nicki and gives her the 12 red roses Riggs gave her. 
When Nicki finds out about the source of the roses she's mad, but her father convinces her to forgive Sasha. 

Sasha decides to quit her job after Riggs kisses her at a party, but Rob co

Episodes.Title: Alex's POV
Episodes.Plot:
Alex chats with a guy on the internet and arranges to meet him. 
Sasha lends him keys to the flat for few hours while Rob's working and she's out. 

Jamie and Sooz have the same idea to use the flat while no one is around not knowing Alex will be there, they steal Rob's keys. 
As soon as Jamie and Sooz undress, Alex and Mark come in and Jamie and Sooz hide under the bed listening in disgust to what goes on above them. 

Nicki barges in looking for Sasha and finds Mark in bed. 
She gets Alex to s

Episodes.Title: Jamie's POV
Episodes.Plot:
Sooz tells Jamie he's not satisfying her. He asks Rob for advice for a "mate of his" who has a problem with girlfriend. 

Sooz walks in on their conversation and asks if this "mate" had many satisfied customers in past. 
Jamie calls his ex-girlfriends and finds awful truth that he never managed to do it for any of them. 

Desperate Jamie calls Gabi. She sends him e-mail to arrange a meeting. Sooz accidentally reads it and suspects Jamie is two timing her and still seeing Gabi. 
She secretly foll

Episodes.Title: Sooz's POV
Episodes.Plot:
Sooz has a conflict: she wants to tell everyone about her relationship with Jamie, but at the same time she's mad at him for lying about seeing Gabi. 

She stalks Gabi to see what she has that makes her so attractive to Jamie, but finds nothing except for habits of a woman older than hers.
Jamie is anxious to make their relationship a public thing, but Sooz hold him back until she sees how far he can go with his lies. 

Meanwhile, Nicki's dad shows up and tells her he's gone bankrupt. While havi

Episodes.Title: Nicki's POV
Episodes.Plot: Nicki finds a new outlet for her retail therapy.

Episodes.Title: Rob's POV
Episodes.Plot: An unexpected visit turns Rob's love life around.

Episodes.Title: Alex's POV
Episodes.Plot: Mark wins the lottery.

Episodes.Title: Sasha's POV
Episodes.Plot: Sasha needs to make a choice.

Episodes.Title: Sooz's POV
Episodes.Plot: Sasha faces a tough decision.

Episodes.Title: Jamie's POV
Episodes.Plot: Jamie discovers there's another man in Sooz's life.

Episodes.Title: Nicki's POV
Episodes.Plot: Nicki realises that she’s been seeing Mark for six weeks and gets obsessed by an old book she’s picked up in the bookshop, Housekeeping Monthly from 1955.

Episodes.Title: Rob's POV
Episodes.Plot: Sasha throws a birthday party and Rob calls on Saffron to be his date.

Episodes.Title: Alex's POV
Episodes.Plot: After overhearing a conversation between Sooz and Alex, Jamie thinks he is being dumped.

Episodes.Title: Sasha's POV
Episodes.Plot: Riggs asks Sasha if she’ll take time off college to look after Portia, his twelve year old daughter.

Episodes.Title: Rob's POV
Episodes.Plot: Rob has a tarts and vicars party at his flat.

Episodes.Title: Sooz's POV
Episodes.Plot: Rob dirty dances with a vicar.

Episodes.Title: Nicki's POV
Episodes.Plot: It’s the day for Paul’s court case.

Episodes.Title: Jamie's POV (Moulin Rouge)
Episodes.Plot: Sasha overhears Sooz making a nasty comment about her, follows her to the bathroom and tells her that Jamie slept with Nicki. She is devastated. Jamie later overhears Sooz telling Alex that although they had broken up and she has no claim to him, she is really upset by it.

Episodes.Title: Sasha's POV
Episodes.Plot: Sasha wakes in Riggs’s bed. He’s not there. When he comes home later, he and Sasha discuss their relationship. Rob wakes with an unwanted girl in his bed. Alex and Mark are tickling each other in Rob’s lounge.

Episodes.Title: From Jamie and Sooz's Point of View
Episodes.Plot: Jamie is doing karate with his new girlfriend Anna, Sooz is with new boyfriend Glen. The next day they bump into each other at breakfast in the canteen. Jamie tries to strike up conversation but Sooz is having none of it.

Episodes.Title: Nikki's POV
Episodes.Plot: Nicki’s got plenty of men on the go. We see her snogging different blokes in college, in the café, in the bar, sneaking another past her mum into her room, then getting a call from another whilst they’re in bed.

Episodes.Title: Alex's POV
Episodes.Plot: We flash back to the gay nightclub where Alex sees Mark kissing Grant, and then to the street where Alex catches Mark and Grant kissing again. Nicki, Mark and Alex go shopping.

Episodes.Title: Sooz's POV
Episodes.Plot: Sooz lies on her bed and thinks about life. Whilst getting out of bed she puts her feet in last night’s pizza box. Rob clears the flat and asks Mark to stay away for the evening.

Episodes.Title: Jamie's POV
Episodes.Plot: Jamie is adamant that there is no future for him and Sooz, even though we’re lead to believe something has happened between them.

Episodes.Title: Sooz's Coma
Episodes.Plot: Jamie Sits by Sooz’s bedside in the ICU unit as a ghostly invisible Sooz watches him through the window. In the bar that night the group discusses Sooz.

Episodes.Title: Nicki's POV
Episodes.Plot: Outside college Nicki tells us that she’s turning over a new leaf. At the party that night, Nicki is looking for love. Mark and Sasha flirt with each other.

Episodes.Title: Rob's POV
Episodes.Plot: From Rob's Point Of View Rob is annoyed to find strangers in his flat. He lays down some ground rules.

Episodes.Title: Sasha's POV
Episodes.Plot: Sasha wakes to the sound of Rob and Anna play fighting. Nicki sneaks out of Rob’s flat.

Episodes.Title: Sooz's POV
Episodes.Plot: In the café Alex tells Nicki about Tony, his latest date. That evening, Alex meets Tony in a posh restaurant. After dinner they go to meet the others in Root Bar.

Episodes.Title: Jamie's POV (Italian Job Style)
Episodes.Plot: Jamie, dressed as a Gladiator, is at work at Aphrodite’s lapdancing club. The next day in the café, Nicki and Alex argue. Sooz gives him a blank look and sits on her own.

Episodes.Title: Sooz's POV
Episodes.Plot: Sooz goes to the café where Seb entertains the group with tales of anger management.

Episodes.Title: Nicki's POV
Episodes.Plot: Nicki realises that she’s been seeing Mark for six weeks. In the bar that night, she quizzes Sasha about her previous relationships.

Episodes.Title: Alex's POV
Episodes.Plot: We flash back to the gay nightclub where Alex sees Mark kissing Grant, and then to the street where Alex catches Mark and Grant kissing again. Nicki, Mark and Alex go shopping.

Episodes.Title: Sasha's POV
Episodes.Plot: In the bar Sasha is approached by a talent agent, Charlie. The gang discuss Mark’s departure.

Episodes.Title: Jamie's POV
Episodes.Plot: Jamie is adamant that there is no future for him and Sooz, even though we’re lead to believe something has happened between them. He wakes up with a start to see Michael Caine (himself dressed as Michael Caine, from Episode 32) standing over him.
